text:
@FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Meanwhile, on Trump’s watch:

Trump Tariffs destroyed farming & industries

GOP Tax Scam exploded debt & deficit

Treasury raided during the pandemic but for the 1% AGAIN!, not to help the people

43m Americans UNEMPLOYED 

124,000 DEAD with Trump’s 70-day deadly delay #COVID19 https://t.co/bUKHitYGwY
